Author: puddlenymph
Text: That's the worst. It's just never okay to comment in someone's size. Sure, maybe 8 times out of 10 it's no big thing but those 2 other people are SCREWED UP over it. It's not worth the risk.    My sister in law did that to me at a wedding once. "How do you stay so skinny!?" She asks. I LITERALLY said, "I stopped eating"  There was a long pause followed by big laugh. "nahh I walk a lot at work I pull like 15k steps before 5pm have you seen my new fitbit you should get one!"  It was awesome.  Kudos for walking away from that one. You made the better choice.
